words.prompt: If you _____________ about something, you think about it because you are curious about it.
If something _____________ over or through a place, it goes over or through there.
_____________ are large groups of people, including bands, moving through a public place for a special event.
A _____________ is clothing you wear to look like something or someone else.
If something is _____________ to two or more people, it is owned or shared by all of them.
_____________ are ways of acting or events that a group of people has done over and over again.
Your _____________ thing is something you like the best.
If something is _____________ by something else, the first thing is closed in on all sides by the second thing.
Something that is _____________ is firm and hard and keeps its shape.
Something that is _____________ is nearby.
_____________ is the planet we live on.
When things _____________, they burst loudly and with a lot of force.
When something is _____________, it is lively.
An _____________ is land that has water all around it.
The _____________ of something are the different ways it looks and acts.
Something that is _____________ has a very sharp slope.
When something is _____________, it is outside and not inside a building.
Things that _____________ make a person feel happy or eager.
_____________ are small amounts of liquid that fall in a round shape.
Something that is _____________ is very light in color.
A _____________ poem does not have to rhyme.
_____________ happens when words that are close to each other begin with the same sound.
_____________ are words that have opposite meanings.
_____________ is when a poet repeats certain words or phrases.
